entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Nipigon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:29 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.6°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
